Agenda

<h2>Week 1: "What Is Internet, Anyway?"</h2>

<h4>Topics</h4>

    <ul>
  • <li>Introductions</li>
  • <li>Class Overview</li>
  • <li> Slides: Archives, Digital Space, A History of the Internet </li>
  • <li> Website Share </li>
  • <li> Software Setup </li>
    • </ul>

Exercises

  • Sketchbook: Collect, Curate, Design
    1. Collect 30 artefacts.
    2. Choose 5. Write about your selection process.
    3. Sketch 10 different ways of presenting these 5 artefacts.
  • Site Analysis
    1. Choose a website.
    2. Assess its layout, information architectre, and design choices.
    3. Submit your response in this Google Form.

Readings

  • Regenerating Archives, Wendy Chun
  • Toward a Notion of the Archive of the Future
  • The Carrier Bag Theory of Fiction

Technical and Design Resources

  • GitHub Site Set Up
  • How Hosting Works
